description:
Build with virtual parts, render designs and create instructions.

Studio is an all-in-one desktop app for Windows and Mac that lets you build with virtual parts, render designs and create instructions.

What can I do with Studio?
Build
You can build your own virtual creations! Start a project from scratch, import a saved LEGOÂ® Digital Designer file, upload a picture to make a mosaic, or just use your imagination and see what happens when you put the pieces together.
Test a design
By testing your design, you can find out if it can be built with real LEGO bricks.
Create or browse instructions
Use Instruction Maker to create step-by-step instructions for your designs
Render designs
Generate photorealistic images and short videos of your designs
Share on the Studio Gallery
Upload your designs on My Studio and publish them on Studio Gallery
Use the BrickLink catalog
Check if the parts in your design are available and how much they cost.
Fixed an issue where decals were cut off when exporting curved parts using the Part Designer.
Fixed incorrect collider for parts: 56908c01 and 30841.
Fixed an issue where decals were lost on import when exporting LEGO minifigure legs or curved parts with decals from Part Designer.
Fixed an issue where, in Flexible Part Edit Mode, dragged points did not move to the intended position when viewed from the side.
Added New Colors: Blue Violet and Warm Pink.
Updated Blue-Violet to Royal Blue (Old Blue-Violet).
Updated Dark Blue-Violet to Dark Royal Blue.
Added 319 new parts.
